Greek Man of the Year, Chapter President of Delta Lambda Phi and 2011 Inter-Greek Council President                              Sister of Pi Beta Phi on Bid Day, 2011.                              Brothers of the Sigma Lambda Beta colony                              Alpha Epsilon Pi hosts their annual 'We Walk to Remember'. Here is their moment of silence in remembrance of the Holocaust.                              Members of the Multicultural Greek council, fundraise in the lobby of the Kimmel Center. Each of the 33 NYU recognized FSL organizations will be tabling at this event and providing valuable information about their organization and how to get involved.   Details for this event can be found below:   Date:   September 3, 2014   Time:   7pm   Location:  Eisner & Lubin Auditorium (4th fl)       60 Washington Square South, NY, NY 10012                 REGISTER for Panhellenic (only) Formal Recruitment here!                                           If you are interested in participating in Panhellenic recruitment, all participants must register by Thursday, September 4th!                               Click here to register for Panhellenic sorority recruitment   Panehellenic Formal Recruitment is September 5, 6, 7 and 13, 14, 2014                                                                                                                                        Follow us on Twitter @NYUGreeks or by        clicking here                                                   Scroll down to see our year end FSL Highlight Video!                                          Stay tuned for info on Interfraternity Council & Multicultural Greek Council Recruitment!
